divs: Sighting DetailsI was in front of my house putting out garbage cans and noticed a bright white light (like Venus in luminosity) moving from NW in sky to SE about the same speed as a small aircraft but no visible flashing wing lights. I decided to watch it as it changed angle in relation to me to see these lights to reassure myself it was a plane (Sacramento airport is not far away or Davis airport). I watched it for several minutes and saw only the one light. I also observed that it had a more graceful movement than a self-propelled vehicle (like gliding) but it stayed at a constant altitude and speed. I heard no noise like you hear with a small prop plane. Finally it was now SE of me and as I watched it- it turned completely red (bright like a laser pointer) and shrunk until it was gone. I was convinced this was not an airplane or helicopter. I have begun staring at the sky since having had several experiences in the past year and going to Mufon conference in July. Would like to talk to someone about this.
Summary: Bright light moving NW to SE - no flashing lights. Followed to look for lights - light turned laser red and shrunk
